basePlanet.description: Creates a new barren planet for a user (first-time setup)
basePlanet.prompt: A perfectly round spherical barren rocky planet. Desert wasteland with craters, no life, no vegetation. Subtle {userColor} colored glow on the edges. Game art style, pure black background.

terraform.description: Modifies an existing planet with user's requested feature
terraform.prompt: Add one small detail to this planet: {userInput}. Keep everything else exactly the same. Only add this one small element.

customPlanet.description: Creates a custom planet from scratch in the Planet Factory
customPlanet.prompt: {userInput}, spherical planet floating in space, game art style, dramatic lighting, black background
